data.name: Tales from Candlekeep - Artus Cimber's Explorer Pack
data.detailed_description:
Dare to venture deeper into the deadly jungles of Chult with Artus Cimber's Explorer Pack. Get a legendary secondary weapon, additional gold pieces, as well as crafting materials to help you in your perilous adventure.

But that’s not all! The package also includes Artus Cimber's d20, an exclusive permanent +1 adrenaline bonus on monster kills*, and a wallpaper of Artus Cimber in super high resolution, 2560x1440 pixels, and lower!

This Pack Includes:


  • Artus Cimber Wallpaper
  • Artus Cimber d20
  • Legendary Dragon Longbow
  • Permanent Bonus: +1 Adrenaline on Monster kills
  • 5,000 Gold Pieces
  • Reinforced Legendary Chest: 40x Diamond, 40x Dragon Hide, 40x Adamantine, 40x Weirwood

*Can be toggled on and off in game if desired.

When purchased and downloaded, the wallpaper artwork will appear at \Steam\steamapps\common\TalesfromCandlekeep\Wallpapers.

fullgame.name: Tales from Candlekeep: Tomb of Annihilation

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560, 1024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: El Capitan (10.11) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
